governing_sections: Mutual consent provisions in other personal laws

applicable_scenarios: Contested divorce (fault grounds: adultery, cruelty, desertion)
Maintenance, alimony, child custody, property disputes

mutual_consent: Draft Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) outlining asset division, maintenance, custody
File joint petition in Family Court/District Court
contested: One spouse files petition citing grounds

steps.title: First Motion Hearing
details: Court verifies marriage, separation (≥1 year for mutual)

steps.title: Cooling-Off Period
steps.notes: Cooling-off may be 6–8 months, possible waiver under special circumstances

where_to_file: Family Court/District Court at last shared residence
Place of solemnization or wife’s residence

special_provisions.joint_petitions_only_mutual: Only mutual consent allows joint filing

important_notes: Mutual consent, separation of ≥1 year required
Cooling-off mandatory but may be waived
Contested divorce takes longer & involves proof
Custody: best interest of child paramount
